properties.description: Radio checked status         Values can be: true or false
properties.name: checked

properties.description: Sets checked status by default when the element is reset       Values can be: true or false
properties.name: default

properties.description: Radio deactivation         Values can be: true or false         Default: false
properties.name: disabled

properties.description: Space that occupy the radio inside parent container.        By default, its size adapts to its content        Values can be: true or false        Default: true
properties.name: inline

properties.description: Toggles the readonly status of the radio element         Default: false
properties.name: readonly

methods.description: Changes different element values to check status
methods.name: _handleCheck

methods.description: Changes different element values to uncheck status
methods.name: _handleUncheck

methods.description: Call method to update check status
methods.name: _setCheck

methods.description: Resets checked status of the element to the default one
methods.name: reset
